meanings.definition: The overall structure or organization of a system or entity.
meanings.sent1: The macrostructure of the building included the main support beams and walls.
meanings.sent2: The macrostructure of the city's transportation system was carefully planned.
meanings.sent3: The aliens were amazed by the macrostructure of the human's sandcastle on the beach.
meanings.sent4: The macrostructure of the company was like a well-oiled machine, each department fitting perfectly into place.
meanings.sent5: The macrostructure of the spider's web was intricate and fascinating to observe.

meanings.definition: A large-scale pattern or arrangement within a system.
meanings.sent1: The macrostructure of the forest revealed a beautiful pattern of trees and clearings.
meanings.sent2: The macrostructure of the economy showed a cyclical pattern of growth and decline.
meanings.sent3: The macrostructure of the jigsaw puzzle made it challenging to find the right pieces.
meanings.sent4: The macrostructure of the music piece was like a symphony of harmonious notes.
meanings.sent5: The macrostructure of the galaxy was a mesmerizing arrangement of stars and planets.

meanings.definition: The general framework or layout of something.
meanings.sent1: The macrostructure of the essay outlined the main points to be discussed.
meanings.sent2: The macrostructure of the garden followed a circular layout with paths leading to different sections.
meanings.sent3: The macrostructure of the cake was so perfect that it seemed almost too beautiful to eat.
meanings.sent4: The macrostructure of the novel was like a roadmap guiding the reader through the story.
meanings.sent5: The macrostructure of the city's architecture reflected a blend of modern and traditional design elements.
